name: James Wright
story: Alfie Smith grew up in the countryside in southern Europe. He always loved being outdoors and enjoyed hunting, hiking, and camping. After finishing high school, Alfie decided to join the military and was assigned to BLUFOR. He quickly became one of the best autoriflemen in the squad and gained the respect of his fellow soldiers. Despite being outgoing and friendly, Alfie prefers to keep his personal life private and does not share much about his family or background with others.
